description.value:
Activation: 1

You hold your weapon high, prepared to deliver a crushing blow downward when your opponent shows weakness.

While in this stance, you gain an advantage on Insight tests. Additionally, when a character within your reach misses you or grazes you with an attack, you can use @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.QpFIxaoCBezzt6yw]{Reactive Strike} against them as if they had voluntarily left your reach.
